user_query: I'm a music blogger and I'm researching the greatest women artists of all time. Can you provide me with the Hot 100 Women Artists chart information from the Billboard-API? Additionally, fetch the basic information and download link for a random song from Soundcloud to feature in my blog post.

TaskList.description: Fetch the Hot 100 Women Artists chart information from the Billboard API.
Fetch the basic information and download link for a random song from Soundcloud.
